title: Bug 18705: Excessive Flashing in Control Example
description: The report mentions excessive flashing in the Control Example without providing a reason.
OB: The observed behavior is excessive flashing in the Control Example, particularly in all tabs of the TabFolder and Frames when the window is resized in the vertical direction.
EB: The expected behavior is for only the bottom edge of the outermost frames to be repainted, eliminating the excessive flashing issue. However, the report doesn't explain why this issue occurs.
SR: To reproduce the issue, run the Control Example and resize the window in the vertical direction only. Observe the excessive flashing in all tabs of the TabFolder and Frames.
